title: Iran's regime is still intact - the coming days will show if it can hold out
summary_full: Iran's surviving leaders are in crisis mode, battling to project security as US and Israel strikes continue.
summary_public: Iran's surviving leaders are in crisis mode, battling to project security as US and Israel strikes continue.
